attributes.action: stop discrimination against women that can't, or don't want to, have children!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Women who can't have, or don't want to have, children miss out on lots of benefits that women who have children are entitled to! eg paid (maternity & parental) leave, free prescriptions & dental treatment whilst on maternity leave, child tax credits, return to work bonuses. 
I propose women should be able to sign an affidavit once they reach age 35yo which would enable them to have 2 periods of 6 months paid leave before retirement, & upon retirement a lump sum equal to the value of the other benefits. If they have subsequantly have children their maternity leave would be on SMP only. 
To have children or not is freedom of choice, to give benefits to those that do have children is discrimination against those that don't!
